LanguageData.AteAwfulMeal.stages.ate_awful_meal.label: ate awful meal
LanguageData.AteAwfulMeal.stages.ate_awful_meal.descr: I had to eat a disgusting, tasteless meal. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.
LanguageData.AteCorpse.stages.ate_corpse.label: ate corpse
LanguageData.AteCorpse.stages.ate_corpse.description: I had to eat the flesh of a dead creature without even butchering or cooking it.
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.stages.ate_fine_meal.label: ate fine meal
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.stages.ate_fine_meal.descrip: I ate a really tasty fine meal. Yum!
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngredient.stages.cook: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. This is horrible.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngredientCannibal.sta: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. So pleasurable. If only I had some fava beans and a nice chianti.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatDirect.stages.raw_cannib: I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. This is a nightmare.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatDirectCannibal.stages.ra: I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. It was so... succulent.
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatAsIngredient.stages.ate_coo: I ate a meal cooked from gray, slimy insect meat. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but there were glands and fluid pockets in there that I can't identify.
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatDirect.stages.ate_insect_me: I ate some gray, slimy insect meat. It was, possibly, the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted.
LanguageData.AteKibble.stages.ate_kibble.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AteKibble.stages.ate_kibble.description: I had to eat animal kibble. It's like I don't get to be human any more.
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.stages.ate_lavish_meal.des: That lavish meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul.
LanguageData.AteRawFood.stages.ate_raw_food.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AteRawFood.stages.ate_raw_food.descripti: I had to eat raw food. We should be cooking that kind of food before eating it. We're not animals.
LanguageData.AteRottenFood.stages.ate_rotten_food.des: I ate some disgusting, putrid food. It was melting in my mouth - but not in a good way.
